full_summary:
# Femtosecond Ultrafast Ti:Sapphire Oscillator

## Title
Femtosecond Ultrafast Ti:Sapphire Oscillator

## Government Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: 24-58064
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-07-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-23T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2024-07-23
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

## Procurement Overview

The National Research Council (NRC) requires the supply of a Femtosecond Ultrafast Ti:Sapphire Oscillator for the Ultrafast Quantum Photonics facilities located on Sussex Drive in Ottawa. 

## Tender Documents

Visit [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) for the tender documents.

- [English Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41827/24-58064_acan_femtosecond-ultrafast-tisapphire-oscillator_en.pdf)
- [French Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41827/24-58064_acan_femtosecond-ultrafast-tisapphire-oscillator_fr.pdf)
